data.name: Daron YÃ¶ndem
data.bio: Daron is a Microsoft Regional Director and an Azure MVP since 2008. He is a regular speaker at international conferences focusing on Microservices, Serverless, and IoT. Daron currently works as a CTO in XOMNI Inc, a cloud company building PAAS offerings for retailers and XOGO where they are building a decision signage platform.
